trans-unit.source: Step 5: Transform the Flat File Schema to the Insert Schema for OrderDetails Table
trans-unit.target: Step 5: Transform the Flat File Schema to the Insert Schema for OrderDetails Table

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the steps to create a <token>transform</token> to map the flat-file message schema to the schema of an <embeddedLabel>Insert</embeddedLabel> operation on the <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> table in <token>ssNoVersion</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic lists the steps to create a <token>transform</token> to map the flat-file message schema to the schema of an <embeddedLabel>Insert</embeddedLabel> operation on the <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> table in <token>ssNoVersion</token>.

trans-unit.source: Before we create a <token>transform</token>, let’s have a look at the two schemas and then let’s understand what needs to be done as part of the <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: Before we create a <token>transform</token>, let’s have a look at the two schemas and then let’s understand what needs to be done as part of the <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: Here’s a snapshot of the two schemas:
trans-unit.target: Here’s a snapshot of the two schemas:

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the mapping requirements and the <token>mapop</token>s using which this is accomplished:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the mapping requirements and the <token>mapop</token>s using which this is accomplished:

trans-unit.source: What to map?
trans-unit.target: What to map?

trans-unit.source: How to achieve?
trans-unit.target: How to achieve?

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>OrderId</embeddedLabel> node in the source schema maps directly to <embeddedLabel>OrderId</embeddedLabel> node in the destination schema.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>OrderId</embeddedLabel> node in the source schema maps directly to <embeddedLabel>OrderId</embeddedLabel> node in the destination schema.

trans-unit.source: You directly connect the two nodes in the two schemas.
trans-unit.target: You directly connect the two nodes in the two schemas.

trans-unit.source: Because <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> node in the flat-file schema is a repeating node, all the values in the <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel> node should be added up and the cumulative value should be passed on to the <embeddedLabel>QuantityOrdered</embeddedLabel> node in the destination schema.
trans-unit.target: Because <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> node in the flat-file schema is a repeating node, all the values in the <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel> node should be added up and the cumulative value should be passed on to the <embeddedLabel>QuantityOrdered</embeddedLabel> node in the destination schema.

trans-unit.source: You connect the <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>QuantityOrdered</embeddedLabel> nodes using a <embeddedLabel>Cumulative Sum</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: You connect the <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>QuantityOrdered</embeddedLabel> nodes using a <embeddedLabel>Cumulative Sum</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>TotalAmount</embeddedLabel> node in the destination schema must contain the cumulative value of all (<embeddedLabel>Unit Price</embeddedLabel> * <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel>).
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>TotalAmount</embeddedLabel> node in the destination schema must contain the cumulative value of all (<embeddedLabel>Unit Price</embeddedLabel> * <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel>).

trans-unit.source: Instructions on how to set this are provided at <link xlink:href="7287db8a-eb40-4e5a-a97b-83b9be793718#BKMK_TotalAmount" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">To map to the TotalAmount element</link>
trans-unit.target: Instructions on how to set this are provided at <link xlink:href="7287db8a-eb40-4e5a-a97b-83b9be793718#BKMK_TotalAmount" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">To map to the TotalAmount element</link>

trans-unit.source: To map to the TotalAmount element
trans-unit.target: To map to the TotalAmount element

trans-unit.source: In <token>vsprvs</token>, right click the <embeddedLabel>FTP_EAI_Tutorial</embeddedLabel> project, point to <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and then select <embeddedLabel>New Item</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <token>vsprvs</token>, right click the <embeddedLabel>FTP_EAI_Tutorial</embeddedLabel> project, point to <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and then select <embeddedLabel>New Item</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Add New Item</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Map</embeddedLabel>, enter <userInput>Map.trfm</userInput> as the map name, and then select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Add New Item</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Map</embeddedLabel>, enter <userInput>Map.trfm</userInput> as the map name, and then select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, double click the <embeddedLabel>Map.trfm</embeddedLabel> file to open the <token>transform</token>.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, double click the <embeddedLabel>Map.trfm</embeddedLabel> file to open the <token>transform</token>.

trans-unit.source: On the <token>transform</token> design area, set the source schema to <embeddedLabel>PO.xsd</embeddedLabel> and set the destination schema to <embeddedLabel>FTPEAITutorial_TableOperation.dbo.OrderDetails.xsd</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: On the <token>transform</token> design area, set the source schema to <embeddedLabel>PO.xsd</embeddedLabel> and set the destination schema to <embeddedLabel>FTPEAITutorial_TableOperation.dbo.OrderDetails.xsd</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: On the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, from the <embeddedLabel>List Operations</embeddedLabel> category, drag-and-drop a <embeddedLabel>Create List</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> on the <token>transform</token> design area.
trans-unit.target: On the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, from the <embeddedLabel>List Operations</embeddedLabel> category, drag-and-drop a <embeddedLabel>Create List</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> on the <token>transform</token> design area.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <token>mapop</token>, select the plus sign, and enter <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel> as the member name.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the <token>mapop</token>, select the plus sign, and enter <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel> as the member name.

trans-unit.source: Enter the <embeddedLabel>Member Type</embeddedLabel> as <embeddedLabel>Number</embeddedLabel> and then select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Enter the <embeddedLabel>Member Type</embeddedLabel> as <embeddedLabel>Number</embeddedLabel> and then select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: By doing this, you are creating an in-memory variable called <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: By doing this, you are creating an in-memory variable called <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Within a <embeddedLabel>List</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, add a <embeddedLabel>ForEach Loop</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, and then connect it to the <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> element in the source schema.
trans-unit.target: Within a <embeddedLabel>List</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, add a <embeddedLabel>ForEach Loop</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, and then connect it to the <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> element in the source schema.

trans-unit.source: You do so because <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> element is a repeating element in the message schema.
trans-unit.target: You do so because <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> element is a repeating element in the message schema.

trans-unit.source: Within a <embeddedLabel>ForEach Loop</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, add an <embeddedLabel>Arithmetic Expression </embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: Within a <embeddedLabel>ForEach Loop</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, add an <embeddedLabel>Arithmetic Expression </embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Connect the <embeddedLabel>UnitPrice</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel> elements from the source schema to this <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: Connect the <embeddedLabel>UnitPrice</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Quantity</embeddedLabel> elements from the source schema to this <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <token>mapop</token> to open the <embeddedLabel>Configure Arithmetic Expression</embeddedLabel> dialog box, and in the <embeddedLabel>Enter arithmetic expression</embeddedLabel> box, type <userInput>UnitPrice * Quantity</userInput>.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the <token>mapop</token> to open the <embeddedLabel>Configure Arithmetic Expression</embeddedLabel> dialog box, and in the <embeddedLabel>Enter arithmetic expression</embeddedLabel> box, type <userInput>UnitPrice * Quantity</userInput>.

trans-unit.source: By now, we have calculated the value of <embeddedLabel>UnitPrice * Quantity</embeddedLabel> for each iteration of the <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> element.
trans-unit.target: By now, we have calculated the value of <embeddedLabel>UnitPrice * Quantity</embeddedLabel> for each iteration of the <embeddedLabel>OrderDetails</embeddedLabel> element.

trans-unit.source: We now need to assign this value to the <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel> variable we created as part of the <embeddedLabel>List</embeddedLabel> operation.
trans-unit.target: We now need to assign this value to the <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel> variable we created as part of the <embeddedLabel>List</embeddedLabel> operation.

trans-unit.source: To do so, we include an <embeddedLabel>Add Item to List</embeddedLabel> operation within the <embeddedLabel>ForEach Loop</embeddedLabel> operation and connect it to the <embeddedLabel>Arithmetic Expression</embeddedLabel> operation.
trans-unit.target: To do so, we include an <embeddedLabel>Add Item to List</embeddedLabel> operation within the <embeddedLabel>ForEach Loop</embeddedLabel> operation and connect it to the <embeddedLabel>Arithmetic Expression</embeddedLabel> operation.

trans-unit.source: Doing this assigns the value from the <embeddedLabel>Arithmetic Expression</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> (which is <embeddedLabel>Unit Price * Quantity</embeddedLabel>) to the <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel> variable created as part of the <embeddedLabel>List</embeddedLabel> operation.
trans-unit.target: Doing this assigns the value from the <embeddedLabel>Arithmetic Expression</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> (which is <embeddedLabel>Unit Price * Quantity</embeddedLabel>) to the <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel> variable created as part of the <embeddedLabel>List</embeddedLabel> operation.

trans-unit.source: A List operation could have many variables defined.
trans-unit.target: A List operation could have many variables defined.

trans-unit.source: Even though in our tutorial, we have just one variable (<embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel>) defined, we still need to configure the <token>transform</token> to pick that variable.
trans-unit.target: Even though in our tutorial, we have just one variable (<embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel>) defined, we still need to configure the <token>transform</token> to pick that variable.

trans-unit.source: To do so, we use the <embeddedLabel>Select Entries</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: To do so, we use the <embeddedLabel>Select Entries</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop the <embeddedLabel>Select Entries</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to the design surface and connect it to the <embeddedLabel>Create List</embeddedLabel> operation.
trans-unit.target: Drag and drop the <embeddedLabel>Select Entries</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to the design surface and connect it to the <embeddedLabel>Create List</embeddedLabel> operation.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <embeddedLabel>Select Entries</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to open the <embeddedLabel>Configure Select Entries</embeddedLabel> dialog box, and from the <embeddedLabel>Select members</embeddedLabel> box, select the check box against <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the <embeddedLabel>Select Entries</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to open the <embeddedLabel>Configure Select Entries</embeddedLabel> dialog box, and from the <embeddedLabel>Select members</embeddedLabel> box, select the check box against <embeddedLabel>Amount</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: We now need to do a cumulative sum of the value in the Amount variable.
trans-unit.target: We now need to do a cumulative sum of the value in the Amount variable.

trans-unit.source: So, we add a Cumulative Sum <token>mapop</token> and then connect it to the Select Entries <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: So, we add a Cumulative Sum <token>mapop</token> and then connect it to the Select Entries <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the Cumulative Sum <token>mapop</token> and in the text box, enter the following expression:
trans-unit.target: Double-click the Cumulative Sum <token>mapop</token> and in the text box, enter the following expression:

trans-unit.source: We must now connect the <embeddedLabel>Cumulative Sum</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to the <embeddedLabel>TotalAmount</embeddedLabel> element in the destination schema.
trans-unit.target: We must now connect the <embeddedLabel>Cumulative Sum</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to the <embeddedLabel>TotalAmount</embeddedLabel> element in the destination schema.

trans-unit.source: This is how the <token>transform</token> should resemble (only for mapping the TotalAmount element in the destination schema):
trans-unit.target: This is how the <token>transform</token> should resemble (only for mapping the TotalAmount element in the destination schema):

trans-unit.source: You can also look at the map available as part of the <embeddedLabel>FTP_EAI_Tutorial</embeddedLabel> sample available at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=247973</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=247973</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can also look at the map available as part of the <embeddedLabel>FTP_EAI_Tutorial</embeddedLabel> sample available at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=247973</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=247973</linkUri></externalLink>.
